Do you know World Letter Writing Day? It falls (1)____ September 1st every year. On this day, people are encouraged (2)____(take) a break from typing on a computer and write letters to express their feelings.

Writing letters (3)____(be) a common way of communication in the past. But now, fewer and fewer people choose to write letters. Many people think writing letters is too slow.

However, letters are (4)____(value) than emails in some ways. A handwritten letter shows more care and love. When you receive a letter, you can feel the (5)____(warm) from the sender.

Anyone who has seen The Sound of Music, the famous Oscar-winning movie, knows the beautiful city of Salzburg in Austria. The movieerta tells the story of Maria, a young woman who becomes a governess for a wealthy family with seven children.

Salzburg is also the birthplace of Mozart, one of the greatest composers in history. Every year, thousands of tourists visit the city to see Mozart's birthplace and enjoy classical music concerts.

The city is surrounded by mountains and has many beautiful gardens. In summer, visitors can enjoy outdoor concerts in the gardens. In winter, the mountains offer excellent skiing opportunities.

C. Skiing
D. Sailing
